p.span: Terlingua CSD does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, or disability in providing education services, activities, and programs, including vocational programs, in accordance with Title VI of the CIvil Rights Act of 1964, as amended, Title IX of the Educational Amendments of 1972, and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended.

p.em: Pioneering education in the Big Bend by inspiring lifelong learners in a professional, creative, and healthy environment where teachers believe in students and students believe in themselves.
